name: baby cardigan
description:
The perfect sweet style for babies.  Brass buttons can be worn in the front or back.  Easy style with no seams will be a favorite over sunsuits, onesies and dresses.  An essential layer for the cool months to come. Makes a lovely set with the sunsuit (as shown on our little model) 
Knit from the softest merino wool.  Hand dyed for a beautiful depth of color.  Machine washable.  dry flat.

Very limited quantities.  This is a special limited edition collection consisting of 6 pieces.  

Each piece knit by hand  in New England

name: fall sunsuit
description:
little one piece with open back.  a lovely layering piece to transition into the cooler months.  Looks adorable over leggings or tights as well. Two wooden buttons in back.  Makes a great set with the cardigan.
Knit from the softest merino wool.  Hand dyed for a beautiful depth of color.  Machine washable.  dry flat.

Very limited quantities.  This is a special limited edition collection consisting of 6 pieces. 

Each piece knit by hand  in New England

Knit from the softest merino wool.  Hand dyed for a beautiful depth of color.  Machine washable.  dry flat.

Very limited quantities.  This is a special limited edition collection consisting of 6 pieces

Each piece knit by hand  in New England
